languages.text: "{name} фон Валанциус рек{mf||ла} заветы, и заветы сии таковы: отринуть ересь праздности, служить и восхвалять Императора. Я переродился, дабы нести сии заветы в деяниях своих. Вечно и рьяно".

"{name} von Valancius spoke {mf|his|her} commandments, and those commandments were: to shun the heresy of idleness, to serve, and to praise the Emperor. I have been reborn in order that I may carry forth those commandments in my deeds. Eagerly and incessantly."
languages.original_text: "{name} фон Валанциус рек{mf||ла} заветы, и заветы сии таковы: отринуть ересь праздности, служить и восхвалять Императора. Я переродился, дабы нести сии заветы в деяниях своих. Вечно и рьяно".

"{name} von Valancius spoke {mf|his|her} commandments, and those commandments were: to shun the heresy of idleness, to serve, and to praise the Emperor. I have been reborn in order that I may carry forth those commandments in my deeds. Eagerly and incessantly."

languages.text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯认真地履行着{mf|他|她}的职责。这些职责是：远离邪恶的异端邪说，为帝皇服务，赞美帝皇。我只所以得到新生，就是为了通过我的实践来履行这些信条。充满热忱，永生不息。”
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius spoke {mf|his|her} commandments, and those commandments were: to shun the heresy of idleness, to serve, and to praise the Emperor. I have been reborn in order that I may carry forth those commandments in my deeds. Eagerly and incessantly."

traits.locale_text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯认真地履行着{mf|他|她}的职责。这些职责是：远离邪恶的异端邪说，为帝皇服务，赞美帝皇。我只所以得到新生，就是为了通过我的实践来履行这些信条。充满热忱，永生不息。”

languages.text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは戒律を示されました。それは、怠惰という異端を避け、皇帝に仕え、皇帝を賛美する事です。こうした戒めを実行に移すために、私は生まれ変わった。熱意を込めて、永遠に」
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius spoke {mf|his|her} commandments, and those commandments were: to shun the heresy of idleness, to serve, and to praise the Emperor. I have been reborn in order that I may carry forth those commandments in my deeds. Eagerly and incessantly."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは戒律を示されました。それは、怠惰という異端を避け、皇帝に仕え、皇帝を賛美する事です。こうした戒めを実行に移すために、私は生まれ変わった。熱意を込めて、永遠に」

languages.text: «{name} von Valancius proclamó sus mandamientos, y esos mandamientos fueron: rehuir la herejía de la ociosidad, servir y alabar al Emperador. He renacido para poder llevar a cabo esos mandamientos, ansiosa e incesantemente».
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius spoke {mf|his|her} commandments, and those commandments were: to shun the heresy of idleness, to serve, and to praise the Emperor. I have been reborn in order that I may carry forth those commandments in my deeds. Eagerly and incessantly."

traits.locale_text: «{name} von Valancius proclamó sus mandamientos, y esos mandamientos fueron: rehuir la herejía de la ociosidad, servir y alabar al Emperador. He renacido para poder llevar a cabo esos mandamientos, ansiosa e incesantemente».

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius hat {mf|seine|ihre} Gebote verkündet, und diese Gebote waren: die Ketzerei der Untätigkeit zu meiden, zu dienen und den Imperator zu preisen. Ich wurde wiedergeboren, damit ich diese Gebote in meinen Taten weitertragen kann. Eifrig und unaufhörlich."
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius spoke {mf|his|her} commandments, and those commandments were: to shun the heresy of idleness, to serve, and to praise the Emperor. I have been reborn in order that I may carry forth those commandments in my deeds. Eagerly and incessantly."

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius hat {mf|seine|ihre} Gebote verkündet, und diese Gebote waren: die Ketzerei der Untätigkeit zu meiden, zu dienen und den Imperator zu preisen. Ich wurde wiedergeboren, damit ich diese Gebote in meinen Taten weitertragen kann. Eifrig und unaufhörlich."

languages.text: « {name} von Valancius a énoncé ses commandements, qui sont les suivants : bannir l'hérésie de la paresse, servir et rendre grâce à l'Empereur. Si j'ai eu droit au don de la renaissance, c'est pour me vouer corps et âmes à l'exécution de ces commandements. »
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius spoke {mf|his|her} commandments, and those commandments were: to shun the heresy of idleness, to serve, and to praise the Emperor. I have been reborn in order that I may carry forth those commandments in my deeds. Eagerly and incessantly."

traits.locale_text: « {name} von Valancius a énoncé ses commandements, qui sont les suivants : bannir l'hérésie de la paresse, servir et rendre grâce à l'Empereur. Si j'ai eu droit au don de la renaissance, c'est pour me vouer corps et âmes à l'exécution de ces commandements. »

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius, buyruklarını dile getirdi. Bu buyruklar şu şekildedir: Atıl durma kâfirliğinden uzak durmak, hizmet etmek ve İmparator'a şükretmek. Eylemlerim vasıtasıyla bu buyrukları yerine getirebilmek için yeniden doğdum. Hevesle ve dur durak bilmeden."
languages.original_text: "{name} von Valancius spoke {mf|his|her} commandments, and those commandments were: to shun the heresy of idleness, to serve, and to praise the Emperor. I have been reborn in order that I may carry forth those commandments in my deeds. Eagerly and incessantly."

traits.locale_text: "{name} von Valancius, buyruklarını dile getirdi ve bu buyruklar şu şekildeydi: Atıl durma kâfirliğinden uzak durmak, hizmet etmek ve İmparator'a şükretmek. Eylemlerim vasıtasıyla bu buyrukları yerine getirebilmek için yeniden doğdum. Hevesle ve dur durak bilmeden."
